definition: having no wires, a communication system based on broadcasting electromagnetic waves
details:
adjective
- having no wires
= example: having no wires
noun
- a communication system based on broadcasting electromagnetic waves
= synonyms: radio
- an electronic receiver that detects and demodulates and amplifies transmitted signals
= synonyms: radio receiver, receiving set, radio set, tuner, radio
- transmission by radio waves
- medium for communication
= synonyms: radio
